title: Code
content:
USV participated in a seed financing of Code, which is building a global payments app on the Solana blockchain. Code announced the financing today on their blog.

You can see a nice visualization of the Code payments experience here and you can download the Code app here.

The Code team is the same team that USV invested in back in 2011 when they were working on the Kik messenger app and I wrote a bit about their journey from messenger to crypto to payments here.

We are big believers in the potential of payments applications built on web3 rails and we are also excited to work with this team again.

The post Code appeared first on Union Square Ventures.
author: Fred Wilson
